summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons internal email regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein's status. It states that on July 30, 2019, Epstein was being taken off Psych Observation and needed to be housed with an appropriate cellmate. The email was later forwarded or tracked with read receipts on August 13-14, 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate (#76318-054) who is the subject of the email, being taken off Psych Observation and requiring a cellmate assignment.

events.title: Epstein Removed from Psych Observation
events.description: Inmate Jeffrey Epstein is taken off Psych Observation status and needs to be assigned an appropriate cellmate.

keyFacts: On July 30, 2019, Jeffrey Epstein was removed from Psych Observation status in Bureau of Prisons custody.
The email directive states Epstein needed to be housed with an 'appropriate cellmate' following his removal from observation.
The document is dated just over two weeks before Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
The email was tracked with read receipts on August 13-14, 2019, after Epstein's death.
Epstein's Bureau of Prisons inmate number was 76318-054.
